summary: A journey that takes one man into the bowels of black magic in Mexico City
cast: Carlos Gallardo|Gizeht Galatea|Gabriel Pingarrón|José Carlos Ruiz|Jorge Zepeda|Sergio Acosta|Ernesto Yáñez|Javier Escobar|Eligio Meléndez|René Campero|Antonio Monroi|Jorge Abraham
director: Director: Eduardo Rodriguez (as Eduardo Andrés Rodriguez González)
title: Curandero
